basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: IT Specialist | Healthcare IT | Microsoft 365 • Azure • EHR Support
basics.summary: IT professional with extensive experience supporting healthcare environments, managing EHR systems, and ensuring HIPAA-compliant IT operations. Skilled in end-user support, system administration, project management, and IT security. Adept at working independently or coordinating with external IT providers to maintain efficient, secure, and reliable healthcare technology workflows.

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Managed a Help Desk team supporting 1,400+ devices for healthcare and business clients
Oversaw migrations from on-premises servers to Microsoft 365, including Exchange, SharePoint, Teams, and Intune
Maintained HIPAA-compliant environments and implemented IT security policies
Provided on-site and remote end-user support for staff and clinical teams
Coordinated with external vendors to resolve IT issues and optimize workflows

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Supported digital dental lab systems and clinical devices in a healthcare environment
Maintained networked systems, CAD/CAM software, 3D printers, and milling machines
Collaborated with clinicians to ensure technology supported efficient patient care

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Led clinical team operations across 6 treatment rooms
Managed IT-related installs, documentation, and device support in compliance with healthcare standards
Supported staff and patient use of technology for clinical workflows

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Provided technical support for software, hardware, and network environments
Managed deployments using Docker, cloud infrastructure, and server management
Authored technical documentation and trained end-users on software and IT systems

skills.name: Healthcare IT & System Administration
keywords: Office 365 / Azure / Active Directory / Intune / Teams

skills.name: Technical Support & Project Management
keywords: IT project coordination and software installations

skills.name: Development & Technical Skills
keywords: Full stack development and API integration
